item.title: About Gigameow
item.author: gigameow
item.description: Hello! I am: a cyborgified human being1 femme non-binary my pronouns are she/they married to a wonderful man since 2006, but we’ve been partners since 1998 chronically ill with a whole bunch of fascinating things2 owned by two cats, Miles and Ivan (yes, nominative determinism is a thing) a voracious reader of speculative fiction and possessed of many opinions including that George R.
